type CallExternalMethodActivity = class inherit Activity interface IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定义用于对本地服务调用方法的工作流通信活动。

span.span: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to call a method on a local service.

summary.span: 此活动用于将数据通过本地服务从工作流发送到宿主中。

span.span: This activity is used to send data from the workflow to the host through the local service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 本地服务是一个类，该类实现本地服务接口（使用 标记的接口）并被添加到 。A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with ) and is added to the . > [!NOTE] > 当调用外部方法时，会克隆该方法的所有参数。When the external method is called all parameters of the method are cloned. 如果参数类型实现 ，则会调用 `Clone` 方法，或者使用 对其进行序列化和反序列化。If the parameter types implement the `Clone` method is called or they are serialized and deserialized with a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义活动中使用 调用外部方法。The following code example shows how to use the in a custom activity to call an external method. 此代码示例摘自 PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs 文件中的“侦听”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Listen SDK sample from the PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[侦听示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f)。For more information, see [Listen Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f). summary.span: 获取或设置外部方法的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for the external method.
The correlation token for the external method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义给定的外部方法调用来自哪个特定的 活动。This property defines which specific activity a given external method call comes from. 然后可以在本地通信服务事件的负载中使用此值以将该事件定向到正确的 活动。This value can then be used in the payload of a local communication service event to direct that event to the correct activity. 有关相关的示例，请参阅[关联本地服务示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。For an example of correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问 `CorrelationToken` 对象的 `CallExternalMethodActivity` 属性。The following sample shows how to access the `CorrelationToken` property of a `CallExternalMethodActivity` object. 此示例摘自 CorrelatedLocalServiceWorkflow.designer.cs 文件的“相关的本地服务”SDK 示例。This sample is from the Correlated Local Service SDK sample, from the CorrelatedLocalServiceWorkflow.designer.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联本地服务示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。For more information, see [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编译时用于验证属性相互之间是否正确绑定。Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another. 如果没有此接口，则会直接从属性的 getter/setter 推断此信息。Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
